We have great beer, approachable food with vegetarian options, outdoor patios, and axe throwing. What more could your party need? and let us know what you're looking for and we'll help you set it all up. Reach out ¬© 2026 Rusty Bull Brewing Co. All rights reserved. . THE BEST RESTAURANT + BREWERY IN NORTH CHARLESTON. Bring a friend and share a great local beer in a relaxed environment. Eat an amazing burger. Wander next door for some activities (including axe throwing) if you're so inclined. #notKidding Restaurant Menu Beer List The North Charleston Restaurant + Production Brewery 3005 W. Montague Ave. Head up to our production brewery in North Charleston for a great beer! Grab a cold beer and some great food seven days a week at our production brewery near Park Circle. Connected to Chucktown Axe Throwing! The Main Event Shuck & Shield Oyster Roast Benefiting Defenders of Children & Sponsored by Tito's Handmade Vodka All Events Featured Beer Rusty Bull's Bearded Tiger Amber Ale Our amber ale has great mouthfeel, refreshing balance of ginger and hop, and caramel notes to round this beer out nicely. Beer List The Big Dish The Uncle Doug Tripple Decker Burger with Cheddar, Swiss, American cheeses. Complimented with Lettuce, Tomato, Pickle, and Rusty Bull Sauce. Give a thought to Uncle Doug as you enjoy this burger. Cheers!! Yes No Host Your Next Event at Rusty Bull No matter how large or small your event, our spacious taprooms and outdoor areas can accommodate groups from 10 to over 100! Large Parties (with Ax Throwing) in North Charleston Rusty Bull Brewing in North Charleston is neighbors with (formerly Chucktown Axe), Charleston‚Äôs premier indoor gaming complex where you can unleash the fun with ax throwing, mini golf, floor is lava, and so much more. Download the flier to learn more about bringing your group or hosting a private event at the gameroom and brewery! Chucktown Activities 8 Lanes of Ax Throwing ‚Ä¢ Plate Smashing Connect 4 Basketball ‚Ä¢ Mini-Golf ‚Ä¢ Light Up ‚ÄòFloor is Lava‚Äô PLUS Foosball, Punch Box, Darts & other arcade games! North Charleston Info Book Your Date! Fill out the form below to give us some information about your event and we'll be in touch as quickly as we can! First Name: Last Name: Email: Phone: About Your Event (include number of people): Spam Check: What is 5 + 2? Send Your Message! Join Us for a Cold One! North Charleston Events Live music, trivia nights, craft beer and axe throwing! There's always something to do at our North Charleston taproom. When you find yourself out in North Charleston near the airport or the PAC, you can always find a cold glass of Charleston-born beer nearby. And if you want to find something else to do ... you've come to the right place! Check out our calendar of events featuring beer releases, trivia nights, live music, the occasional comedian and yoga class! ¬© 2026 Rusty Bull Brewing Co. All rights reserved. .
